alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 1:13PM MST until December 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Johnson County, Southeast Johnson County and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 2 PM Saturday to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
